title: Green chemistry: advancing planetary phosphorus sustainability through the synergy of graphene oxide modified with magnetic nanoparticles (M@GO) for extracting tertiary effluent phosphorus in sewage treatment plants
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,2607-2619
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00859B, Paper

The M@GO sorbent is easily separated from wastewater by a magnetic field.
